name: Soldier World Adventure
description:
Soldier World Adventure is a classic game with a super boy (Sboy) trip that will brings you back to your childhood. In the Soldier World Adventure, Sboy must crush enemies to pass so many threats.

Great Game Features
- Great graphics and music.
- easy to play - hard to master
- classic jungle retro running and jumping adventure
- addictive, thrilling and challenging jungle adventure hit
- old school jump and run
